name: Squid Aimer
description:
Have you ever wanted to drastically improve your aim in your favorite squid-based shooter? Squid Aimer is a gyro aim trainer that mimicks the squid game's control style and feel, and contains numerous scenarios that focus on certain areas of improving your gyro aiming mechanics. It has training scenarios that focus on accuracy, timing, reactivity, smoothness, and more.

Squid Aimer currently supports the following controllers connected by USB or Bluetooth: Nintendo Switch Pro Controller, Joycons, DualShock 4, DualSense. Third party controllers may work if you can connect them in "Nintendo Switch" mode, but results will vary.

Join the community Discord server to discuss and improve!

Follow Vespher on Twitter for updates and news!
